item.title: Blog Road Map
item.description:
The quick road map as the graph above:

Life-related articles record the author’s personal life, such as ‘Migrant Story’, ‘Philosophy and Religion’ and ‘Post-reading Notes’.

IT-related articles are mainly classified as ‘Series Technical Tutorials’ and ‘TestOps Knowledge Framework’…
